# Load the E. Coli Data from NCBI

data from NCBI ECOLI S16 rRNA

```{r}
library(ape)
#character vector of accession numbers for the project

IDs <- c('LC848137.1', 'LC844827.1')
sequences <- read.GenBank(IDs,
                          seq.names = IDs,
                          species.names = TRUE,
                          as.character = TRUE)
write.dna(sequences, "DNA.fasta", format = "fasta")
```
